formattedAddress: One Pennsylvania Plaza, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: One Pennsylvania Plaza, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: This incident happened on October 21 They tried to be slick, for the alfas concert I parked VIP when I left the concert to get my car the guy brought me my car driving fast and past me I found it strange the way he drove my car so fast and stoped a few feet away from me. Also where I originally parked my car they moved it for no reason. When I went to pick my car up the same car that was next to me was still there but my vehicle was moved. Please check your car before leaving this garage. They will drive fast and past you on purpose. Make sure if they do this look at your car before you leave.

originalText.text:
Great experience here. Drop off was easy, all of the staff was very nice (especially the woman at the cashier station).

From the time I gave her my ticket to the time the car was ready was just under 3 minutes (I timed it out of curiosity and for this review). Not a scratch on the car -- impressed, and I'll be using this garage again.

originalText.text: The staff was very nice & courteous.  We picked up our vehicle after a show ended in The Garden.  We only waited 2 minutes for someone to get our vehicle & there were at least 30 people ahead of us. Would definitely use them again.

text.text: The staff was very nice & courteous.  We picked up our vehicle after a show ended in The Garden.  We only waited 2 minutes for someone to get our vehicle & there were at least 30 people ahead of us. Would definitely use them again.

originalText.text:
They kept my key I drove off not realizing it until I got to a gas station 30 miles away and shut the car off. Tried calling them but they never pick up the phone. Had my friend go there to ask if they had the key the manager got very nasty and said we don’t have it so I was stranded in NJ with no key. This is not the first time I had to deal
With this nasty manager I park their all the time
They crashed my car once and tried to send it you a shady body shop so they didn’t have to report it corporate.  This man needs to be fired

originalText.text: Will never use this parking garage again.  They are nasty and they are thieves.  We pulled in and the attendant told us it was $60 to park and our car would be brought down or $80 for VIP parking and our car would be left for us as soon as we got back and we wouldn’t wait. He proceeded to hand us a ticket and said pay $60 when we come back but the $20 for Vip parking had to be paid in cash before we left the car.  Well I thought to myself this has to be a scam and it sure was.  We came back after the show at msg let out to find our cars not parked on the ground level. Had to wait 45 minutes to get our cars.  We demanded our $20 ($40 between both of our vehicles ) they threatened to call the cops on us and we told them they could we weren’t leaving without our money.  If you wanna charge for VIP parking than provide your services that you promised. I’ll walk further away than even using this lot again. Staff was very nasty about the issue
